text: Vesijärvi is a lake in Päijänne Tavastia, Finland. It covers about . It is next to Lahti, Asikkala and Hollola. The water in Vesijärvi is clear. It contains many kinds of water plants. Vesijärvi flows to Päijänne. == Islands == * Enonsaari * Isosaari * Kahvisaari * Myllysaari * Vasikkasaari * Selkäsaari ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Lakes of Finland Category:Lahti
title: Vesijärvi
